content.text: Pretty good! I just got off work, so I'm relaxing right now.
Nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher, and I just finished grading papers.
Oh, that sounds tough! I'm sure your students appreciate it, though.
Thanks! I hope so. What do you do for a living?
I'm a musician, and I just got back from a long run.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of music do you play?
I mostly play folk music. I love performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I am excited to see my girlfriend after my run.
That's nice! I hope you have a great time.
